sourcesContent:
Bookmark App

Name Category Language Date Added Actions Edit Button Delete Button
{{ bookmark.name }} {{ bookmark.category }} {{ bookmark.language }} {{ bookmark.dateAdded }} ...
// home.component.ts import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { bookmarks = [ { name: 'Bookmark Page 1', category: 'Category 1', language: 'English', dateAdded: '2023-07-27' }, { name: 'Bookmark Page 2', category: 'Category 2', language: 'Spanish', dateAdded: '2023-07-28' }, { name: 'Bookmark Page 3', category: 'Category 1', language: 'French', dateAdded: '2023-07-29' } // Add more bookmark objects as needed ]; deleteBookmark(index: number) { this.bookmarks.splice(index, 1); } }
